title: How to fix YouTube error 500 - Quora

response.answer_text: YouTube error 500 is a server-side error of YouTube itself and its "host" servers, meaning that the problem probably isn't with your computer or Internet connection. However, if you indeed want to check out whether you can fix YouTube 500 Internal Server Error by yourself or not, you can read on. When YouTube can't complete the action you’ve taken, an error message may appear on your device. There are many root causes of error messages, many of which are out of YouTube’s control, including a bad internet connection and insufficient memory on your device. Some of the most common error messages are: “Please check your network connection (Retry).” "Error loading. Tap to retry." “No Connection.” “500 Internal Server Error.” If you want to know more youtube tips, you can check this website How To Get More REAL YouTube Views - 10 Helpful Tips

If you are talking about the Google Play Error 500. Try uninstalling updates for YouTube completely and then install it again. Another thing you can try is clearing the cache and data of Google Play Store from the app settings. Another widely used method is to first remove your google account (gmail) from the settings and then add it back again. Then proceed to update YouTube on Google Play Store.
